name: "Wings" Quiz for True Fans 3 | Wings | 10 Questions

questions.text: What names did Lowell choose to name his sister's twins?
questions.explanation:
Nancy and Fancy.

	The tradition in the Mather family was for the godfather to name the child.  Lowell was the godfather but was thrown for loop when his sister had twins.  At Joe's suggestion, he named them Nancy and Fancy.

questions.text: What sport was Davis playing when all of the sudden he realized he wanted to ask Helen to marry him?
questions.explanation:
Golf.

	He was on the fairway and it just hit him that he wanted to ask Helen to be his wife.  He didn't have a ring so he gave her a golf ball.

questions.text: What was the name of the football coach who came back to town that Joe and Brian dressed up as a woman?
questions.explanation:
Dan Mattay.

	Dan Mattay was back in town for a building dedication in his honor.  He died in his sleep the night before.  Joe and Brian snuck in his hotel and dressed him like a girl to get back at him for always calling them girls in high school.

questions.text: Where did Joe propose to Helen?
questions.explanation:
Elevator.

	Joe chased Helen to New York to stop her from being with Davis Lynch.  He caught up with her in his apartment building, stopped her on the elevator, and poured his heart out to her.

questions.text: Which of the following was NEVER a guest star on "Wings"?
questions.explanation:
Delta Burke.

	John Ritter played Casey's husband Stuart.  Kirstie Alley played Rebecca Howe, her character from "Cheers", in the episode where the gang goes to see Clint Black.  John Hawkes played Mark the waiter in two episodes during the run of the show.

questions.text: What was the name of Lowell's bestfriend/cousin that he always went on rat shoots with?
questions.explanation:
Beavo.

	Although we never get to meet Beavo, Lowell mentioned him often.  One of Beavo's favorite things was to collect spores, fungi, and molds.

questions.text: What was the name of the character that Tracy Walter played in the episode "Two Jerks and a Jill"?
questions.explanation:
Tucker.

	This was the only episode where Tucker showed his face. He was also a good friend of Lowell's that participated in the rat shoots.

questions.text: What song did Carlton Blanchard sing when he was trapped in the cab with Antonio, Alex, Roy, and Lowell?
questions.explanation:
99 Bottles of Beer.

	Carlton hired Antonio to be his chauffeur because he was being honored as Nantucket's retired Businessman of the Year.  The gang was having to take a shuttle to the parking lot and it was late so they rode with Antonio.  He pulled up to close to the building and then a car pulled up close to him on the other side, trapping them all in the car.

questions.text: Roy's ex-wife showed up in Nantucket and told him that she wanted him back.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Sylvia showed up and told Roy that she wanted him back.  The only reason that she did this was because her husband had an affair and she wanted to hurt him also.  She figured what better way to do it than with Roy.

Lambert.

	Alex Lambert came to the island to start up a helicopter business.  She had a romance with Brian Hackett that ended badly and she went back to Florida.
